column1: Local Foods////I've eaten at Local Foods multiple times (probably between 5 and 10)
column2: because of the organic culture of the restaurant. I've always heard that the ingredients are brought in from local farmer's markets each day to prepare the menu. Also
column3: the menu is always a good twist on classic sandwiches and salads-- why have a regular pulled pork sandwich when you can have a lemongrass pulled pork sandwich with roasted red peppers and aioli? (That was one of the specials
column4: which are always worth checking out).
